docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This page will show how to start using Hub CTL

docs.title: Other pre-build binaries
docs.text: There are macOS amd64, macOS arm64, Linux amd64, Linux arm64 and Windows x64 binaries.

docs.title: Extensions
docs.text:
Optionally, install extensions:

hubctl extensions install

Hub CTL Extensions requires: bash, curl, jq and yq v4. Optionally install Node.js and NPM for hubctl pull extension, AWS CLI, Azure CLI, GCP SDK, eksctl for hubctl ext eks extension.

docs.title: HubCTL Overview
docs.text:
Hub CTL is stack composition and lifecycle tool:

  • template and stack creation, stack deploy / undeploy / backup lifecycle;
  • stack and component parameters, output variables, and state;

docs.title: Stacks Overview
docs.text: This page will contain overview of available stacks
